EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: Self-Checkout Best Practices—Here’s What You Need to Know
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Don’t forget to sign up <[[https://ncr.webex.com/mw3300/mywebex/default.do?nomenu=true&siteurl=ncr&service=6&rnd=0.849898926739081&main_url=https%3A%2F%2Fncr.webex.com%2Fec3300%2Feventcenter%2Fevent%2FeventAction.do%3FtheAction%3Ddetail%26%26%26EMK%3D4832534b000000042d52f6827cd3268623482ec1a299d76fae7c031a11ecce7c104b00419fd60ab0%26siteurl%3Dncr%26confViewID%3D174929494333727071%26encryptTicket%3DSDJTSwAAAAQUxoNYKtFkiceyAOLPcPTD4S2HrcEnyyWVkn8mXlwZQA2%26]]> for the NCR hosted Self-Checkout Best Practices webinar.
A key part of successful store transformation is having a clear vision and strategy for what your customer experience will look like—think convenience and inspiration. Join us for an informative session on self-checkout best practices for success. The session will cover:
- The factors to consider while you evaluate adding or expanding self-service in your store - Planning a successful pilot project, including staffing models, training, customer communication and more - Success beyond the pilot store
Join the conversation <[[https://ncr.webex.com/mw3300/mywebex/default.do?nomenu=true&siteurl=ncr&service=6&rnd=0.849898926739081&main_url=https%3A%2F%2Fncr.webex.com%2Fec3300%2Feventcenter%2Fevent%2FeventAction.do%3FtheAction%3Ddetail%26%26%26EMK%3D4832534b000000042d52f6827cd3268623482ec1a299d76fae7c031a11ecce7c104b00419fd60ab0%26siteurl%3Dncr%26confViewID%3D174929494333727071%26encryptTicket%3DSDJTSwAAAAQUxoNYKtFkiceyAOLPcPTD4S2HrcEnyyWVkn8mXlwZQA2%26]]> and see how self-checkout helps you meet modern day challenges while making change simple!
Webinar: Self-Checkout: Key Best Practices for SuccessDate: Thursday, November 12, 2020 Time: 2p.m. Eastern Standard Time ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
